body.p:
Lebanon June 30th 1862
Hon. Beriah Magoffin
Gov &c
This goes with Charley Rollers Petition -- He Raller has the reputation of being a quiet harmless man --

The Baxters who fell out with him & carried guns for him had at the time no small amt of character as desperadoes & I have no hesitation in saying that I believe Raller had no motive in carrying the Pistol but that of self defence
If not inconsistent with your duties I hope you will give to Mr Raller these hard times all the relief in your power
